segments.text: I think the woman is completely absorbed in her task, not noticing anything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and her foot is already wet, but she doesn’t react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and she has no idea what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, waiting for him to share the cookies with her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip, and the floor is getting slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they all get out of this without getting hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of those moments where everything could go wrong in an instant.
segments.speaker: PAR
